alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Levy; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Levy; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, western Pasco, Hernando, south central Levy, northern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 816 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Black Diamond to near Hernando County Airport to near Clearwater. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, New Port Richey, Brooksville, Homosassa Springs, Hudson, Beverly Hills, Holiday, Lutz, Weeki Wachee, Palm Harbor, New Port Richey East, South Brooksville, Black Diamond, North Brooksville, Land O Lakes, Greater Carrollwood, Hernando County Airport and Timber Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
